short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Tiny Fishing as a Chrome extension - Also can Play without Internet, try it now!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Tiny Fishing Game Extension on Chrome" is a fun and engaging Chrome extension that allows users to enjoy a quick and simple fishing game without leaving their browser. With a user-friendly interface and adorable graphics, this extension provides an immersive gaming experience that is perfect for a quick break from work or studying.

Players can cast their lines and try to catch as many fish as possible within a limited amount of time, with each catch adding to their score. The game's difficulty increases as the player progresses, making it challenging yet addictive. The extension also includes various power-ups and bonuses to help players improve their scores and catch more fish.

Overall, "Tiny Fishing Game Extension on Chrome" is a great way to take a quick break and have some fun while using your browser. It's suitable for all ages and is sure to provide hours of entertainment.
